channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo -- BIOS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo -- BIOS

item.title: CVE-2020-8336|2024-09-16T19:56:08.433Z -- lenovo -- bios
item.description: Lenovo implemented Intel CSME Anti-rollback ARB protections on some ThinkPad models to prevent roll back of CSME Firmware in flash.

item.title: CVE-2020-8320|2024-09-16T17:33:07.639Z -- lenovo -- bios
item.description: An internal shell was included in BIOS image in some ThinkPad models that could allow escalation of privilege.

item.title: CVE-2020-8333|2024-09-16T17:38:49.850Z -- lenovo -- bios
item.description: A potential vulnerability in the SMI callback function used in the EEPROM driver in some Lenovo Desktops and ThinkStation models may allow arbitrary code execution

item.title: CVE-2020-8322|2024-09-16T20:52:30.716Z -- lenovo -- bios
item.description: A potential vulnerability in the SMI callback function used in the Legacy USB driver in some Lenovo Notebook and ThinkStation models may allow arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2019-6171|2024-09-16T20:03:17.346Z -- lenovo -- bios
item.description: A vulnerability was reported in various BIOS versions of older ThinkPad systems that could allow a user with administrative privileges or physical access the ability to update the Embedded Controller with unsigned firmware.

item.title: CVE-2023-25493|2024-08-02T11:25:18.371Z -- lenovo -- bios
item.description: A potential vulnerability was reported in the BIOS update tool driver for some Desktop, Smart Edge, Smart Office, and ThinkStation products that could allow a local user with elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2023-25493|2024-04-05T20:46:00.491Z -- lenovo -- bios
item.description: A potential vulnerability was reported in the BIOS update tool driver for some Desktop, Smart Edge, Smart Office, and ThinkStation products that could allow a local user with elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2023-25493|2024-07-31T19:31:26.044Z -- lenovo -- bios
item.description: A potential vulnerability was reported in the BIOS update tool driver for some Desktop, Smart Edge, Smart Office, and ThinkStation products that could allow a local user with elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2023-25493|2024-09-16T14:50:40.027Z -- lenovo -- bios
item.description: A potential vulnerability was reported in the BIOS update tool driver for some Desktop, Smart Edge, Smart Office, and ThinkStation products that could allow a local user with elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code.
